name: Symmetrical Reality
description:
Help this tiny horse who found herself in a universe with symmetries! But be careful, there are some unreal objects with no reflections!

Hint: The blue line on the maps indicates where the symmetry occurs!

Controls
WASD or Arrow keys to move
Space to Jump
Escape to Pause/Unpause

Made by
Overflow Narhoym & Syntriax

You can find the music theme here.

All assets are made by us.
